body.p: For contracts with direct participation features, if an entity changes the basis of disaggregation of insurance finance income or expenses between profit or loss and other comprehensive income, applying paragraph B135, it shall disclose, in the period when the change in approach occurred:

li.p: the reason why the entity was required to change the basis of disaggregation;
the amount of any adjustment for each financial statement line item affected; and
the carrying amount of the group of insurance contracts to which the change applied at the date of the change.
